text:
Sophie, who stars as Sansa in the hit HBO series, has hinted that there could be some more sibling rivalry when the show returns. In season seven of Game of Thrones, fans were no doubt gripped as they watched Sansa and her half-brother Jon Snow (played by Kit Harington) argue over how to rule the North. While Jon was named King in the North, he quickly rode off to see Daenerys Targaryen (Emilia Clarke) and beg her to help fight the Night King (Vladimir Furdik). When Jon left Winterfell, Sansa took control and it seems like she may take the reigns a little more in the new series. Speaking of how her character takes on a more powerful role in season eight, Sophie explained: “She’s used Littlefinger for all he has.

“As she said, ‘Thank you for all your lessons.’ He has nothing left to give her. “So she is so empowered. She has a family behind her. She has Littlefinger, Cersei, Margaery, everyone’s wisdom and teachings all behind her. “She’s a real, try leader of Winterfell now.” Sophie went on to tell Digital Spy: “And that’s where we first see her - as a very protective, empowered lady in charge. “It’s the first time you ever see her like that, and it’s so amazing to see her like that - kind of owning her destiny.”

Game of Thrones season 8 spoilers: Sansa Stark to BETRAY Jon? Star drops HUGE clue

Game of Thrones sexiest women Tue, July 25, 2017 The sexiest women from Game of Thrones Play slideshow HBO 1 of 42 Emilia Clarke as Daenerys the unburnt emerges naked from the flames

With Jon having been gone for so long, could he return to Winterfell to find Sansa has betrayed him and taken control? It’s certainly likely, especially when the Stark children find out that Jon is really Aegon Targaryen. Sansa, her sister Arya (Maisie Williams) and their brother Bran (Isaac Hempstead-Wright) all worked together to take down Littlefinger (Aidan Gillen) in the series seven finale. Given that Sophie noted that she has her “family behind her”, it seems that the trio could team up so that the Stark family take control of the North while Jon fights alongside Daenerys. But will Jon survive without them?

Game of Thrones season 8 spoilers: Sophie Turner stars as Sansa Stark

Game of Thrones season 8 spoilers: Will the Starks betray Jon after he teamed up with Daenerys?
title: Game of Thrones season 8 spoilers: Sansa Stark to BETRAY Jon? Star drops HUGE clue

meta_data.description: GAME OF THRONES is not set to return to television screens until next year but Sansa Stark actress Sophie Turner has been treating fans to clues about what they can expect from the eighth and final series.
